title: Aditya Bharath
text:
Hi, I am a Senior at UCLA double majoring in Statistics and Economics. My journey has fueled a passion for data analytics, and I find particular excitement in applying these skills to the dynamic realms of sports and business intelligence.
I am intrigued by the transformative potential of quantitative analysis in shaping decision-making processes, whether at an individual or organizational level.

title: Projects
